Description:
Detects execution of the built-in script located in "C:\Windows\System32\gatherNetworkInfo.vbs". Which can be used to gather information about the target machine

Author: blueteamer8699
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Reconnaissance Activity Via GatherNetworkInfo.VBS
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%gathernetworkinfo.vbs%' and ((process_path like '%\cscript.exe' or process_path like '%\wscript.exe') and (original_file_name = 'cscript.exe' or original_file_name = 'wscript.exe')))
